title: Learning Design Tool Utilization Competency Enhancement Course for Pre-Service Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Systematic acquisition of digital tool competencies for mathematics curriculum design targeting pre-service teachers from medical/legal/technical professions. Emphasizes collaboration and project-based learning via BYOD (Bring Your Own Device)

learning_goals: Learners can independently design mathematics curriculum project-based learning (PBL) using learning design tools (LDT)
Learners can systematically structure learner activity types and organizational methods using the visual representation features of LDT
Learners can integrate technology-enhanced learning (TEL) elements into the learning design process and apply the design outcomes to an LMS
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
